get.description: Fetches all of the options for a given catalog.

parameters.name: DivisionIntegrationId
parameters.description: The Integration id of the division that the catalog is in.

parameters.name: CommunityIntegrationId
parameters.description: The Integration id of the community that the catalog is in.

parameters.name: SeriesIntegrationId
parameters.description: The Integration id of the series that the catalog is in.

parameters.name: PlanIntegrationId
parameters.description: The Integration id of the plan that the catalog is in.

parameters.name: ElevationIntegrationId
parameters.description: An optional filter. If supplied, elevation specific options will be included in the results.

parameters.name: IncludeDiscontinuedOptions
parameters.description: An optional flag. Indicates whether or not discontinued options should be included in the results. Defaults to False.

post.description:
Allows caller to request Catalog Option Updates and/or Delete for Catalog Options in a specific VDS Tenant's Catalog.
    When updating catalog options, only the Price and Description may be changed. This endpoint was migrated over from the
    legacy Builder Catalog Tool (BCT). It uses Catalog Option Ids to identify the options to be modified.

202.description: Indicates that the request was accepted and is queued for processing.

400.description: Indicates that a data validation error occured.

get.summary: Fetch Address Specific Plan Catalog Options
get.description: Fetches all of the options for a given address specific plan catalog.

parameters.name: DivisionIntegrationId
parameters.description: The Integration id of the division that the catalog is in.

parameters.name: AddressSpecificPlanIntegrationId
parameters.description: The Integration id of the address specific plan.

parameters.name: IncludeDiscontinuedOptions
parameters.description: An optional flag. Indicates whether or not discontinued options should be included in the results. Defaults to False.

get.description:
If an elevation is specified, then only options for that elevation, as well as options that are valid in all elevations, will be returned.
If an elevation is not specified, then all options for the catalog will be returned.

parameters.name: DivisionIntegrationId
parameters.description: The Integration id of the division that the catalog is in.

parameters.name: CommunityIntegrationId
parameters.description: The Integration id of the community that the catalog is in.

parameters.name: SeriesIntegrationId
parameters.description: The Integration id of the series that the catalog is in.

parameters.name: PlanIntegrationId
parameters.description: The Integration id of the plan that the catalog is in.

parameters.name: ElevationIntegrationId
parameters.description: An optional filter. If supplied, elevation specific options will be included in the results.

parameters.name: IncludeDiscontinuedOptions
parameters.description: An optional flag. Indicates whether or not discontinued options should be included in the results. Defaults to False.

get.summary: Fetch Address Specific Plan Catalog Options by Category
get.description: Fetches all of the options for a given address specific plan catalog, within a specific category.

parameters.name: DivisionIntegrationId
parameters.description: The Integration id of the division that the catalog is in.

parameters.name: AddressSpecificPlanIntegrationId
parameters.description: The Integration id of the address specific plan.

parameters.name: IncludeDiscontinuedOptions
parameters.description: An optional flag. Indicates whether or not discontinued options should be included in the results. Defaults to False.

get.description: Returns all of the root category names in the system.

Returns all of the categories a specific catalog. A category will only be returned
    if it contains options for the requested catalog.

parameters.name: DivisionIntegrationId
parameters.description: The Integration id of the division that the catalog is in.

parameters.name: CommunityIntegrationId
parameters.description: If supplied, the categories will be filtered to those that contain options in the catalog for the community with this Integration id.

parameters.name: SeriesIntegrationId
parameters.description: If supplied, the categories will be filtered to those that contain options in the catalog for the series with this Integration id.

parameters.name: PlanIntegrationId
parameters.description: If supplied, the categories will be filtered to those that contain options in the catalog for the plan with this Integration id.

parameters.name: ElevationIntegrationId
parameters.description: If supplied, the categories will be filtered to those that contain options in the catalog for the elevation with this Integration id.

parameters.name: IncludeDiscontinuedOptions
parameters.description: An optional flag. Indicates whether or not discontinued options should be considerd when selecting categories. Defaults to False.

get.summary: Fetch Address Specific Plan Catalog Categories
get.description:
Returns all of the categories for a specific address specific plan catalog. A category will only be returned
    if it contains options for the requested catalog.

parameters.name: DivisionIntegrationId
parameters.description: The Integration id of the division that the catalog is in.

parameters.name: AddressSpecificPlanIntegrationId
parameters.description: The Integration id of the address specific plan.

parameters.name: IncludeDiscontinuedOptions
parameters.description: An optional flag. Indicates whether or not discontinued options should be considerd when selecting categories. Defaults to False.

get.description: Searches for all products that match the given criteria.

parameters.name: DivisionIntegrationId
parameters.description: The Integration id of the division that the catalog is in.

divisionIntegrationId.description: The Integration id of the division that the catalog is in.

updateCatalogOptions.description: An optional list of Catalog Options to be updated in the Division's Catalog.

deleteCatalogOptionsWithEffectiveDates.description: An optional list of Catalog Options to be deleted from the Division's Catalog, on a specific date.

deleteCatalogOptions.description: An optional list of Catalog Option Ids to be deleted from the Division's Catalog.

apikey.description: API Key needed to access the endpoints. X-API-KEY: {key}
apikey.name: X-API-KEY
